item.title: Gen Z dreams of a ‘Ralph Lauren Christmas’ in a dollar store American economy
item.description: A "Ralph Lauren Christmas" doesn't have to be sourced from a Ralph Lauren store. It's more a state of mind, and it's more popular than ever.

item.title: ‘You will see mass chaos. You will see mass flight delays. You’ll see mass cancellations’: Transportation Secretary desperate for shutdown to end
item.description: Sean Duffy said that a lot of his air traffic controllers can manage missing one paycheck, but two is another matter.

item.title: Popular Sandwich Chain Undergoes Massive Overhaul, Closing Bakeries

item.title: How to Get Workers and Employers on the Same Page About Salary Negotiations
item.description: It turns out that you, as the boss, may be the problem: staff don’t think you’re open to salary discussions.

item.title: Roelof Botha steps aside as Sequoia’s steward, passing the role to Alfred Lin and Pat Grady
